QuestData.Title: Potency
QuestData.Description: To make the Dream Brew, we will need several ingredients.$B$BFirst, to improve its strength, I will need an ingredient from a fearsome creature, the legendary Mist Horror.$B$BIt is said that this creature only appears where the fog is deepest.$B$BNorth and east of here, you will find smaller Mist Creepers roaming the swamps. Kill these creatures until the Mist Horror appears, and then bring me its heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Mist Creepers until a Mist Horror appears, then collect a Mist Horror Heart.
QuestData.CompletionText: The mists seem to have a mind of their own, do they not?
QuestData.RewardText: This is an amazing specimen! I am quite shocked that you have succeeded, actually.
